Question: Describing Guthrie's impact on him, this person later wrote: "The songs themselves had the infinite sweep of humanity in them ..
Hints: This person made two important career moves in August 1962.
It also reached number one on the UK album chart, 39 years after this person's previous UK album chart topper New Morning.
During the late 1970s and early 1980s, this person converted to Christianity.
